title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 919.7 - Acquisition of real property in connection with private rail crossings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 919.7 - Acquisition of real property in connection with private rail crossings

State Regulations

The commissioner is authorized to acquire real property
in connection with projects involving private rail crossings. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
919.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
